attributes.action: Clamp down on extremist muslim preachers such as Omar Bakri for causing nothing but racism and hate amongst all the British
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why on earth is this allowed to happen in this country!?!

If us british were to live in a muslim country then we are made to obey their rules and they have zero tolerance on the smallest of things yet, yet we can have hate preachers such as Omar Bakri preaching hate, causing trouble and generally causing a division between NON EXTREMIST BRITISH MUSLIMS and the rest of Britain.

How can we allow him to live in Britain whilst preaching hate against all the non muslims and trying to turn this country into something it is not!

I petition the government to press for laws to detain and charge/deport Omar Bakri and other muslim hate preachers.  I know everyone has the right to free speech but this is pure racism and if it were the other way around then we would be prosecuted for racism so why isn't something done over it!
